title: Explicit Feature Interaction-aware Uplift Network for Online Marketing. (arXiv:2306.00315v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: As a key component in online marketing, uplift modeling aims to accurately capture the degree to which different treatments motivate different users, such as coupons or discounts, also known as the estimation of individual treatment effect (ITE). In an actual business scenario, the options for treatment may be numerous and complex, and there may be correlations between different treatments. In addition, each marketing instance may also have rich user and contextual features.
